segments.text: Those kids are up to no good, trying to sneak cookies like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is standing on that stool, and it looks so unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe how reckless he's being, all for a few cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for her share, not caring about the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're going to get into so much trouble if they get caught.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I remember doing similar things when I was a kid, but this seems extra risky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks like it's about to tip over any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit annoyed at how careless they're being.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just right there, and they think they can get away with it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don't end up hurting themselves or making a huge mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's like watching a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR
